# Overtone

Overtone is a simple and elegant browser addon to bring a volume control slider into the web interfrace of overcast.fm. 
It is simple and does not inject very much javascript or css. It does not require any special permissions.

- https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/overtone/
- https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/overtone/mdmchiodppienobaicjdadhcmcjacbdp

The Extension is Open Source under a MIT LIcense and avaible at https://github.com/KurzGedanke/Overtone.
